statements.select: select Empclockdate,EmployeeId ,(select BusinessHoursId from Flextime as b where a.EmployeeId=EmployeeId and a.EmpclockDate=FlexDate ) as BusinessHoursId,(select (select FromHour from BusinessHours where b.BusinessHoursId=BusinessHoursId) as FromHour from Flextime as b where a.EmployeeId=EmployeeId and a.EmpclockDate=FlexDate) as FromHour ,(select (select FromMinute from BusinessHours where b.BusinessHoursId=BusinessHoursId) as Mytime from Flextime as b where a.EmployeeId=EmployeeId and a.EmpclockDate=FlexDate ) as FromMiute,(select (select ToHour from BusinessHours where b.BusinessHoursId=BusinessHoursId) as Mytime from Flextime as b where a.EmployeeId=EmployeeId and a.EmpclockDate=FlexDate ) as ToHour,(select (select ToMinute from BusinessHours where b.BusinessHoursId=BusinessHoursId) as Mytime from Flextime as b where a.EmployeeId=EmployeeId and a.EmpclockDate=FlexDate ) as ToMinute from ClockData a where EmployeeId=#value# and substring(convert(char,EmpclockDate,120),1,10)=#value#
SELECT * FROM [dbo].[ClockData] where EmployeeId=#value# ORDER BY EmpclockDate ASC
SELECT top 1 * FROM [dbo].[ClockData] where Clocktime between #starttime# and #endtime# and EmployeeId=#empid# and ClockType='上班' ORDER BY Clocktime
SELECT top 1 * FROM [dbo].[ClockData] where Clocktime between #starttime# and #endtime# and EmployeeId=#empid# and ClockType='下班' ORDER BY Clocktime desc
SELECT * FROM [dbo].[ClockData] where Empclockdate between #starttime# and #endtime# and EmployeeId=#empid# order by Empclockdate desc
SELECT * FROM [dbo].[ClockData] where Empclockdate between #starttime# and #endtime# order by Empclockdate desc
select * from ClockData where Empclockdate >=dateadd(mm,-3, getdate()) order by Empclockdate desc
SELECT TOP 1 FileNames FROM ClockData WHERE FileNames = #value#
SELECT TOP 1 ClockTime FROM ClockData WHERE CardNo = #cardNo# AND Clocktime > #MinDateTime# AND Clocktime < #MaxDateTime# ORDER BY Clocktime $ordertype$
SELECT DISTINCT EmployeeId FROM HrDailyEmployeeAttendInfo WHERE YEAR(DutyDate) = #Year# AND MONTH(DutyDate) = #Month#
